<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Pairaka](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1119)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Often charming, sometimes even seductive, pairakas worm their way into mortal relationships, subtly destroying the ties of friendship and love through emotional and physical corruption and plague. Pairakas appear as beautiful, blue-skinned humanoids spotted with large rashes and boils, but they rarely take on their true forms. Instead, they adopt shapes that attract just enough attention for them to worm their way into the confidences of those they wish to torment and corrupt.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Fiend](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 23

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 21

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 18
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Div_Pairaka.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 7">[Pairaka](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1119)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="LE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Div" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=351" />
<trait label="Fiend" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=70" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 70</row>

**Perception** +15; [greater darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Daemonic](/Languages.aspx?ID=31); [telepathy](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=37) 100 feet

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +14, [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +13, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +20, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +20, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +16, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +13, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +13, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +16

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +5

**Con** +3

**Int** +2

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +7
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 24 

**Fort** +12 

**Ref** +16 

**Will** +17 

+1 status to all saves vs. magic
</row>

**HP** 105

**Immunities**
[disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46)

**Weaknesses**
[cold iron](/Equipment.aspx?ID=375) 5, good 5

**Hatred of Red** Pairakas hate the color red. They won't wear the color or willingly enter any place painted red. Given a choice, they'll attack a creature wearing red first. If barred from expressing their displeasure toward the color by force or some magical effect, they take 2d6 mental damage at the end of their turn.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet, fly 35 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +16 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Evil](/Traits.aspx?ID=64), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)),
**Damage** 2d8+6 slashing plus 1d6 evil and bubonic plague

**Divine Innate Spells** DC 25
- **Cantrips (4th)**
[Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66)
- **4th**
[Charm](/Spells.aspx?ID=34) (at will), [Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69) (at will), [Misdirection](/Spells.aspx?ID=198) (at will; self only), [Outcast's Curse](/Spells.aspx?ID=211) (at will), [Suggestion](/Spells.aspx?ID=315) (at will)

**Rituals** DC 25

- **1st**
[Div Pact](/Rituals.aspx?ID=46)

**Bubonic Plague**  ([Disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46)) A creature can't remove the [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15) condition while infected; **Saving Throw** DC 23 Fortitude; **Onset** 1 day; **Stage 1** fatigued (1 day); **Stage 2** [enfeebled 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) and fatigued (1 day); **Stage 3** enfeebled 3, fatigued, and take 1d6 [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) every 1d20 minutes (1 day)

**[Change Shape](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=8)** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=127), [Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157), [Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32)) The pairaka can take the appearance of any Small or Medium [humanoid](/Traits.aspx?ID=91) or [animal](/Traits.aspx?ID=9). This doesn't change their Speed or their attack and damage modifiers with the Strikes, but it might change the damage type their strikes deal.

**Tormenting Dreams** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) **Frequency** once per day; **Effect** The pairaka torments a sleeping creature within 100 feet with visions of betrayals by loved ones and friends. The target must attempt a DC 25 Will save, with the effects of the [_nightmare_](/Spells.aspx?ID=208) spell.

</column>
